Bless/Buff: Gone Berserk
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], No Effect on Mindless [mind], Affects Friendlies Only [enemyimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok], No effect on Inanimate [inanimateimmune], Does not affect user unless hitting x% of battlefield [userimmune])
A small group of soldiers are forced to go berserk. Berserkers never rout, get increased fighting skills, but do not care much for their own safety.
